Arcane Catastrophes.name: Catastrofe Arcana
Arcane Catastrophes.description: You read it wrong you illiterate fool! A caster who rolls the same result twice explodes in screaming black fire in which the faces of the dead are seen. D6 damage each round. Water only feeds this fire.

To Leave Cube-Violet.name: To Leave Cube-Violet
To Leave Cube-Violet.description: You fall through Refva into the esoteric dimension of Cube-Violet, a place of mythical obscurity. The walls are smooth, iridescent and cold. Above, an endless inferno. To leave:
